shortDescription.text: Low severity - Denial of Service (DoS) vulnerability in bzip2

help.markdown:
## Overview
Use-after-free vulnerability in bzip2recover in bzip2 1.0.6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted bzip2 file, related to block ends set to before the start of the block.

## References
- [GENTOO](https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201708-08)
- [CONFIRM](https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1319648)
- [SECTRACK](http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1036132)
- [BID](http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/91297)
- [CONFIRM](http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/bulletinjul2016-3090568.html)
- [MLIST](http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/06/20/1)

message.text: This file introduces a vulnerable bzip2 package with a low severity vulnerability.
This file introduces a vulnerable bzip2 package with a low severity vulnerability.
